mapper.select: select member.member_id, member.member_pwd, member.member_name, auth.member_id, auth.auth_rank from joinus_member member left outer join joinus_auth auth on member.member_id = auth.member_id where member.member_id = #{userid}

SELECT * FROM joinus_boardattach A, (SELECT last.* FROM(SELECT board_num_order.*, rownum rn FROM(SELECT * FROM joinus_board WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY board_num DESC) board_num_order ) last WHERE rn BETWEEN 6*#{cnt}+1 AND 6*(#{cnt}+1)) B WHERE A.board_num = B.board_num
